ygData.subject: RE: Skills Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: Uhm does disarm traps even work?  And if so how do you use the skill? Also, what about Pick Locks? Sylly p.s. also ever see those room keys you can buy in
ygData.messageBody:
Uhm does disarm traps even work? And if so how do you use the skill?

Also, what about Pick Locks?

Sylly

p.s. also ever see those room keys you can buy in Golden Rooster in HH?
Anyone know what they do? You get told that they cost XXgp and the room
rant is YYsp per month. Does having one get your bank account drained?

p.s.s. ever look in the rooms on second floor golden rooster? Two of them
have females in the rooms. Could they be.....???

p.s.s.s. Verant nerfs everything - those rooms all have twin beds <g>


-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 11:18 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Skills Survey


From: <kim@...>

On Thu, 11 Nov 1999, Talies the Wanderer wrote:
>
> Which of the following skills do you use regularly?
> Forage, Sneak, Safe Fall, Hide, Disarm Traps, Tracking, Pick Locks

You do realize people who aren't high enough level to have
some of these skills are going to say they don't use them
regularly? Tracking is probably the most useful skill we get,
but it's a L35 skill so most people will say they won't use
it.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
